title: Cash Shop Update on April 17
content: Wisp's Wondrous Wonderberry, Premium Surprise Style Box, and more!

title: Inkwell's Note: Greetings!
content: The Head of Western Development will share his greetings as well as the future plans for the service.

title: Check Out the April 2024 Art Corner
content: Look at this month's roundup of our favorite fan art!

title: Cash Shop Update for April 10
content: Mysterious Easter Baskets, Royal Styles, Bunny Permanent Outfit Packages, and more!

title: [Completed] Scheduled Maintenance - April 11, 2024
content: The maintenance has been completed and we have extended Cash Shop items for 3 hours. Please restart your Nexon Launcher or Steam to make sure that you get the latest client! Thank you for your patience.

title: Once More! Halflinger Flower Viewing
content: Upgrade your Halflinger skill even further to maximize your training!
